      • handleEventMessage

        public String handleEventMessage(String msg,
                                 Object msgobj,
                                 Map<String,String> metainfo)
                          throws EventHandlerException
        Description copied from interface: ExternalEventHandler
        Handles the external event message The passed in message
        Specified by:
        handleEventMessage in interface ExternalEventHandler
        Parameters:
        msg - message from external system in string format
        msgobj - message from external system in parsed form, such as generic XML bean, JSON object. It is passed in as null if the message cannot be parsed or does not have an object representation (such as USO orders)
        metainfo - meta information around the request message, such as protocol, reply to address, request id, event name, event id, event instance id, arguments specified for handler, etc. See constants in Listener.java for typical ones
        Throws:
        EventHandlerException

      • createErrorResponse

        public String createErrorResponse(String request,
                                  Map<String,String> metaInfo,
                                  Throwable eventHandlerException)
        Description copied from interface: ExternalEventHandlerErrorResponse

        This method should be implemented in your own event handler to control what error/fault message would be sent back in the case of an exception thrown from your event handler. This gives the developer full control of the response sent back in the case of exception. 2 things to note:

        • Normally the exception is an EventHandlerException type
        • This callback mechanism is currently only supported for SOAP messages

        Specified by:
        createErrorResponse in interface ExternalEventHandlerErrorResponse
        Parameters:
        request - This is the original request received by an MDW servlet
        metaInfo - This contains metaInfo populated by the ListenerHelper
        eventHandlerException - This is the exception thrown from eventhandler
        Returns:
        The string xml of the error response
        See Also:
        com.qwest.mdw.listener.ListenerHelper
